didn't elaborate. Eric Schmidt also challenged the assertion that Google is locked in a competitive battle with Facebook. "We have a competitor called Microsoft( MSFT)," he said. Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. "This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about," Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the prime minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. "That is only one example of the close ties woven between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown , when they were prime ministers, and David Cameron now, and the Rupert Murdoch camp- the private meetings and dinners, the calls( no hacking there) and the mutual interest. We once used to think of the establishment as being cabinet ministers, archbishops, BBC panjandrums, leaders of industry and royalty. No longer.
